post.text: If you're voting for Hillary, don't stop there. We need to support Democrats down the ticket to make her vision for America a reality.

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: We need to get Congress away from Republicans or we'll have eight years of one ridiculous investigation after another. Billions of tax payer's dollars wasted to block a female president from doing her job.

replies.author: Nakayla
replies.text: Think about this: the FBI discovers that Hillary Clinton, who is married to a rapist, has some of her classified e-mails on a laptop that belongs to a pedophile, who is married to Hillary's closest friend and confidant who is a Muslim, whose mother has suspected ties to the Muslim Brotherhood and was an editor for a radical Islamic magazine that opposes woman's rights. And the majority of women in America love her. You can't make this up.

replies.author: Nakayla
replies.text: A vote for Hillary is a Constitutional crisis. Yes, a Constitutional crisis. You think this FBI investigation is just going to go away. It's not. It is going to lead to Hillary Clinton's impeachment should she win.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Nakayla Obviously, you CAN make it all up. Nothing you said has been proven.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: A vote for Clinton is a vote for this country. EVERYONE in this country; not just white men.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Please tell us your thoughts on the fraud case Trump is going to court on in November and the rape lawsuit that is set for December.....and the other 76 lawsuits pending.
